long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browsing experience into a faster and more productive journey with SearchBar.pro. This powerful extension allows you to search websites, access your favorite platforms, or open web services directly from a unified search field. Maximize your efficiency with keyboard shortcuts that let you work seamlessly without relying on your mouse. ⌨️💻

🔍 Instant Search: 
Quickly enter a URL or keyword to start a search or jump directly to a website.

⚡ Dynamic Shortcuts: 
Effortlessly launch frequently used functions like Google Maps, YouTube, and Wikipedia with simple keyboard combinations.

📚 Bookmark Management: 
Add or remove bookmarks instantly with a keystroke.

🤖 ChatGPT Integration: 
Run intelligent queries directly using a shortcut, bringing AI assistance right to your fingertips.

Overview of Shortcuts:

Ctrl + Space: ✨ Open the extension.
URL + Enter: 🌐 Start a website or search.
Hover + →: ➕ Add a bookmark.
Hover + ←: ➖ Remove a bookmark.
Term + -img: 🖼️ Initiate an image search.
Term + -gpt: 💬 Execute a ChatGPT query.
Term + -wiki: 📖 Search Wikipedia.
Term + -yt: 🎥 Explore YouTube.
Term + -maps: 🗺️ Navigate Google Maps.

How It Works:

🧠 Smart Suggestions: 
As you type, get suggestions based on your frequently visited websites. The extension intelligently highlights matching URLs, ensuring you find what you need quickly.

🔗 Seamless Integration: 
Easily add and manage bookmarks, ensuring your favorite sites are just a keystroke away.

🫧 User-Friendly Interface: 
Enjoy a clean and responsive design that enhances your search experience.
Get Started:

Install the extension.
Install the extension. 🚀
Use the shortcuts to navigate and search effortlessly.
Bookmark your favorite sites for easy access. 📌

Upgrade your browser navigation with SearchBar.pro—your all-in-one search solution!
